# Distributions

## Uniform distribution

Suppose X ~ Exp(3). What is the value of P(x > 1/3)?
It's PDF is given by f(x) = $\lambda e^{-\lambda x}$ for x > 0 and zero otherwise.
E[X] = $\frac{1}{\lambda}$
Var[X] = $\frac{1}{\lambda^{2}}$
